alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 11 at 12:14PM MST until May 11 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND VERY HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHERN GILA COUNTY... * AFFECTED AREA...Southern Gila County/Tonto National Forest Foothills. * TIMING...Through early this evening. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * IMPACTS...Fuels are dry and fire danger is very high. These conditions combined with low relative humidity and strong winds will lead to widespread hazardous fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills
